forum.name: updates
forum.description: find out what's new with anylad. feature announcements and bug fix info. thanks all!
forum.latestCommentText: im gonna miss it for sure

thread.title: Build Animation improvements & more

comments.text: Hi all! Here's what's new in version 171.6 (you're on [version]). Thx everyone!
When doing a Build Animation, the collisions are kept where they were now, so one cannot e.g. move through a door with this!
... also, Build Animations are now an area right that can be altogether disallowed (to prevent e.g. seeing what's behind a wall). Thx Jinx, Da, Speed Strike!
You can now customize the start delay before a Build Animation starts! We also fixed a bug with an overlong start delay. Thx Xau!
The area rights information moved from the back of the Area dialog to Area dialog -> ... -> Rights, adding more color & info!
Update 171.10: The "allow/ disallow build animations" command now shows in the auto-completion & works! Thx Jinx!
And Update 171.11: Sub-Thing parts are now also included in Build Animations (albeit their merged variants, unless merging is disabled in the Me settings)!

thread.latestCommentText: And Update 171.11: Sub-Thing parts are now also included in Build Animations (albeit their merged variants, unless merging is disabled in the Me settings)!
